name: Noelle
title: Maid of Favonius
description: A maid in the service of the Knights of Favonius that dreams of joining their ranks someday.

normalattack.name: Favonius Bladework - Maid
normalattack.description: Perform up to four consecutive strikes. When charged, perfoms continuous spin attacks that deplete Stamina.

elementalskill.name: Breastplate
elementalskill.description: Summons protective stone armor that deals Geo DMG. When Charged attacks hit enemies, there's a chance to regenerate all party member's HP.

elementalburst.name: Sweeping Time
elementalburst.description: Stone gathers around her Claymore and she inflicts Geo DMG in large AoE.

passivetalent1.name: Maid's Knighthood
passivetalent1.description: There's a 12% chance of getting two food items when achieving Perfect Cooking on DEF-boosting recipes.

passivetalent2.name: Devotion
passivetalent2.description: Occurs when Noelle is in the party but not on the field. If a party member's HP falls below 30%, it creates a shield equal to 400% Noelle's DEF. It can only occur once every 60s.

passivetalent3.name: Nice and Clean
passivetalent3.description: Every four Normal or Charged Attack hits decreases Breastplat CD by 1s.

constellations.d1: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.
constellations.d2: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Breastplate by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: When Breastplate's duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of Geo DMG to surrounding enemies.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Sweeping Time by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6:
Sweeping Time increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.
 Additionally, every enemy defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

profile.description: Like most of Mondstadt's young people, Noelle always dreamed of being a knight of Favonius when she grew up. She may not have what it takes to be a knight just yet, but she is learning. Working as a maid at the Knights' headquarters, she is constantly taking notes on what constitutes knightly speech, knightly conduct, and knightly customs. She holds firm to her belief that one day she will join their ranks - she just needs to keep trying her hardest at everything she does.

zhdescription: 「西风骑士团」的可靠女仆，梦想有天能成为正式的骑士

zhnormalattack.name: 西风剑术·女仆
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击：进行至多四段的连续挥砍。
重击：持续消耗体力旋转大剑，攻击周围的敌人。结束旋转时，会进行一次格外有力的挥斩

zhelementalskill.name: 护心铠
zhelementalskill.description:
诺艾尔既是侍奉的女仆，也是坚毅的骑士
唤出护体的岩铠，对周围的敌人造成岩元素伤害，并创造护盾，为诺艾尔吸收伤害。护盾存在期间，诺艾尔的普通攻击与重击命中敌人时都有几率为队伍中所有角色回复生命值治疗量与护盾吸收量基于诺艾尔的防御力。对岩元素伤害有250％的吸收效果。

zhelementalburst.name: 大扫除
zhelementalburst.description:
需要扫除的，有时不仅仅是灰尘…
积聚岩石的力量，冲击周围的敌人并进行一次大范围攻击，造成岩元素伤害与晶化效果在接下来的一段时间里，极大提高诺艾尔的攻击能力，将她的普通攻击与重击的伤害转为岩元素，并对命中的敌人施加晶化效果。在技能持续时间内，诺艾尔的攻击范围会大幅提高同时依据诺艾尔的防御力，提升攻击力。

zhpassivetalent1.name: 全心全意
zhpassivetalent1.description: 当诺艾尔在后台时，若场上角色的生命值低于30％时，立即获得一个护盾，该护盾能吸收等同于诺艾尔的防御力400％的伤害。护盾最多持续20秒，60秒内只能触发一次。

zhpassivetalent2.name: 干净利落
zhpassivetalent2.description: 诺艾尔的普通攻击或重击每命中4次，都会减少护心铠1秒的冷却。同时命中多名敌人视作攻击命中一次

zhpassivetalent3.name: 女仆的态度
zhpassivetalent3.description: 完美烹饪防御类食物时，由12%概率获得2倍产出

zhconstellations.d1: 同时处于大扫除与护心铠状态时若攻击命中，则一定触发护心铠的生命值回复效果。
zhconstellations.d2: 诺艾尔的重击体力消耗降低20造成的伤害提升15％。
zhconstellations.d3: 护心铠的技能等级提高3级。（最高提升至15级）
zhconstellations.d4: 护心铠在效果结束时，或因伤害破碎时，会对周围的敌人造成400％攻击力的岩元素伤害。
zhconstellations.d5: 大扫除的技能等级提高3级。（最高提升至15级）
zhconstellations.d6: 大扫除额外提高诺艾尔防御力50％的攻击力。此外，在技能持续时间内，每打倒1个敌人，其持续时间将延长1秒最多不会超过10秒。
